name: We need to go up
description:
Prove yourself by climbing as high as you can in 3 minutes.

How to play:
1. Left click to stop the direction pointer.
2. Choose your jump power by moving mouse vertically.
3. Left click again to confirm, or right click to cancel.

You can press 'ESC' to end the game early.

Game created in 3 days during "ScoreSpace Jam #10"

*BUG NOTICE*
>Your first highscore most likely wont save, so when launching the game for the first time. press "ESC", add something to the scoreboard and click the restart button.
>use fullscreen mode to prevent your power bar from going out of the frame (16:9 aspect ratio).
